net.derquinse.common.i18n

Class Locales

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.base.NotInstantiable

  • public final class Locales
extends NotInstantiable
    Utility methods for Locales.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

    • Method Detail

      • getParent

        public static Locale getParent(Locale locale)
        Returns the parent of the provided locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - Provided locale.
        Returns:
        The parent locale or null if the provided locale is null or the provided locale has only language component.

      • fromString

        public static Locale fromString(String localeString)
        Returns a locale parsed from a string. Allowed values are:
        • language
        • language_country
        • language_country_variant
        Parameters:
        localeString - String to parse.
        Returns:
        The parsed locale.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if unable to parse the argument.

      • fromString

        public static Function<String,Locale> fromString()
        Returns a function encapsulating the fromString method.
        Returns:
        The fromString function.

      • safeFromString

        public static Locale safeFromString(String localeString)
        Returns a locale parsed from a string.
        Parameters:
        localeString - String to parse.
        Returns:
        The parsed locale or null if the argument is null or unparseable.
        See Also:
        fromString(String).

      • safeFromString

        public static Function<String,Locale> safeFromString()
        Returns a function encapsulating the safeFromString method.
        Returns:
        The safeFromString function.
